Molly, thank you so much for coming to join me today and cheering with me.
You are welcome.

Yes, I appreciate it. So, erm, your mother called me and said that, erm, erm, there are some problems with kids because you have problems at school and you're mean and things like that, and erm, that's a hurtful thing.
